main event: Approximately 20 flight line personnel at Craig AFB, Alabama, sighted a white light emitting blue-green waves on 15 August 1968.
interesting points: The light was observed stationary near the runway for several minutes before moving up and down and then disappearing,The light emitted blue-green waves that got larger, similar to water ripples,The observers described the light as a bright round disk surrounded by a diffuse halo,The sighting lasted approximately 2 to 3 minutes before the light blinked out,The conclusion of the report suggests that the sighting was likely caused by a rocket launch from Cape Kennedy.
sighted object: a bright white light emitting blue-green waves
witness description: flight line personnel at Craig AFB
